post_detail.description:
Click 3X DNA is in both advertising and entertainment. Branded Content needs to be engaging and magnetic while delivering on the advertising and marketing goals. Click 3X has both creative and executional capability in both traditional and digital. 
Thus the case studies show formidable execution, all in house, strong innovative creative in traditional (i.e. video) branded content and extensive digital skills that bring an entirely new dimension to branded content â€“ interactive, mobile and experiential.
post_detail.title: Branded Content
